title: Smart Data Models - DiscreteValue
description: Adapted from CIM data models. DiscreteValue represents a discrete MeasurementValue.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be DiscreteValue

Command.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The MeasurementValue that is controlled. Default: None

Discrete.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The values connected to this measurement. Default: None

value.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The value to supervise. Default: 0
